content.question: On the basis of the experimental data, what was <math alttext="the molar concentration of B a with a positive 2 charge" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mpadded><msup><mi>Ba</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mpadded><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mpadded></math> in the original <math alttext="50.0 milliliter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>50.0</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>mL</mi></math> sample of the solution?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
